name: Filthy Aliens
description:
Your are a pirate and Aliens are polluting the ocean. Try to Stop them.

Use the arrows or A and D to move.  Aim and Shoot with the mouse.

Download and open the .exe file.

Thx for taking the time.

Art and Music:

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/treasure-hunters

https://hello-tazzina.itch.io/animals

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-enemy-spaceship-2d-sprites-pixel-art

https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-tileset-layer-junkyard-kelvana-prime

Music by John_Sib from Pixabay
